descriptions:
['DescriptionYAS Properties are pleased to offer for sale this large studio situated in the popular development of Mina Al Arab. The property is ideally situated to make the most of the F&B outlets within the community and being just a short walk to Choithrams super market.
The property will make an ideal investment for the new owner. 
Living area 
Patio door to Juliette balcony, Built-in wardrobes and ceramic floor tiles. 
Kitchen 
Fitted with a range of base and wall units with work surface over and inset stainless steel sink with single drainer and mixer tap, space for fridge/freezer, oven and washing machine, ceramic floor and wall tiles. 
Bathroom 
Walk-in shower cubicle, low level WC, Pedestal wash hand basin, ceramic floor and wall tiles. 
About Mina Al Arab:
Mina Al Arab was shaped keeping nature in the focus of everything in it. For this reason, a majority of the development is devoted to preserving and showcasing the core of life in ecological preserves. Occurring as natural coastal wetlands and dunes, the ecological district at Mina Al Arab is home to a variety of fascinating marine life you cannot stop admiring.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionAbode Property are pleased to market this amazing 1 bedroom unit in the well located & highly requested Marina Gate 1, Dubai Marina.This exclusive 1 bedroom apartment is located on a mid floor and is one of the most favoured units due to its layout, floor level & amazing golf course view.Entering the apartment in to a hallway bellowing with light, passing the cloak area & powder room into the modern fitted kitchen complete with gas oven, cooker and integrated electrical appliances.The living area is filled with light granted from the floor to ceiling panoramic windows spanning the whole of the spacious living/dining area, leading to the balcony with boast an amazing golf course view.Each bedroom has floor to ceiling windows, built in wardrobes & en-suites.The property will be vacant on transfer.Amenities:Infinity poolIndoor & outdoor gymBasketball & paddle tennis courtKids splash pool/play areaTram & MetroBeachSZRPrivate & Guest parkingShopsPromenade access\nCall Mattia on +971565775168 or visit www.abodeproperty.ae']
